Articles.Content:
Recently, someone posted a video of KSP on a Chinese equivalent of Youtube, and the game exploded. However, weeks have past yet nobody has been able to make a working translation since it involves extracting strings from game executables and DLL libraries. Yes most players will be playing pirated copies, but Steam is available in China and more people are switching to genuine software everyday due to the blooming economics. It would be wise to at least make it possible to translate the game if not releasing an official Chinese version of the game.

I having translated Mechjeb into Chinese including proper translations of all technical and scientific terms, will be more than happy to provide translations if necessary, as long as the technical problems are solved.

As far as I know translations to other languages are planned, but not for now. The game UI and most of the text changes too often and would need everything to be translated over again, so they rather wait until later on before making versions in different languages.
